content: Approximately 90% of the population in what Caribbean island country lives on its largest island, New Providence?

I believe the Caribbean island country you're referring to is The Bahamas. New Providence is one of the islands in The Bahamas, and it's where the capital city, Nassau, is located. A significant portion of the country's population resides there due to economic opportunities and infrastructure. So, it's likely that around 90% of the Bahamian population lives on New Providence Island.
